subject: French Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: While Roger Federer edged closer to one of the grandest achievements in tennis history by beating Mario Ancic in straight sets in the men's quarterfinals, Martina Hingis lost to Kim Clijsters.
snippet: While Roger Federer edged closer to one of the grandest achievements in tennis history by beating Mario Ancic in straight sets in the men's quarterfinals, Martina Hingis lost to Kim Clijsters.
